SEARCH
Package Network.message

Class WriteInChatMessage

java.lang.Object
Network.message.Message
Network.message.WriteInChatMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WriteInChatMessage extends Message
An extension of the Message Class. A WriteInChatMessage is sent whenever a Player decides to write a message in the game chat. Have a look at Message Class for more information.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • WriteInChatMessage

      public WriteInChatMessage(String Nickname, String chat, String receiver)
      This method creates an instance of WriteInChatMessage
      Parameters:
      Nickname - a String containing the nickname of the sender
      chat - a String containing the actual chat message
      receiver - a String containing the nickname of the receiver, or 'Everyone' if the message is meant to be shown on the public chat

      public String getReceiver()
